algorithms.name: substitution mapping
algorithms.html: For RDF terms t, x, and y, where either y is not a triple term or x does not appear in y, we define the <dfn id="dfn-substitution-mapping" tabindex="0" aria-haspopup="dialog" data-dfn-type="dfn">substitution mapping</dfn> t[x/y] inductively, as follows:

steps.html: If t = x, then t[x/y] = y.
Otherwise, if t = (s, p, o), then t[x/y] = (s[x/y], p[x/y], o[x/y]).
